'''The PRISM Program''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to break all of an [[Electro Hypostasis]]' Revival Prisms before it can be revived.

}}

== Trivia ==
* The name is likely a reference to {{w|PRISM}}, a mass-surveillance program run by the NSA.
